Metadata.title: Nakafa: Free High-Quality Learning Platform (K-12 to University)
Metadata.description: Access free, high-quality learning resources on Nakafa. Covering K-12, university subjects (Math, Science, CS, AI), exam prep & more. Start learning!
Metadata.short-description: Free, quality learning for all levels.
Metadata.keywords: free learning resources, quality education platform, online tutoring, K-12 education, university courses, STEM education, mathematics tutorials, physics lessons, chemistry help, biology study guide, computer science basics, data science learning, artificial intelligence course, exam preparation online, study materials free, educational technology, Nakafa learning, Indonesian education support, interactive learning modules, programming tutorials online, digital learning tools, academic excellence resources, e-learning platform, free educational content, lifelong learning

Onboarding.title: Welcome to Nakafa!
Onboarding.description: We're excited to have you here. Let's personalize your learning experience by getting to know you better.

Subject.grade-description: Let's learn about what you want to know.

Articles.description: Academic research and publications based on scientific methods.

Holy.quran-description: Blessed is the one who reads the Quran and follows its guidance.
Holy.read-quran-description: Read the Quran online with complete translation and in-depth interpretation available on Nakafa

Exercises.type-description: Prepare yourself for the exam with real-world practice.
Exercises.simulation-description: Challenge yourself in a realistic exam mode where results and explanations appear only after submission.
Exercises.practice-description: Master concepts at your own pace with instant answers and detailed explanations.
Exercises.start-exercise-description: Choose between simulation or practice mode to start your exercise.
Exercises.start-exercise-error: Couldn't start the exercise. Please try again.
Exercises.complete-exercise-description: Review your answers one last time before submitting to see your score.
Exercises.complete-exercise-stats: You have answered <mark>{answered}</mark> out of <mark>{total}</mark> questions.
Exercises.complete-exercise-error: Something went wrong finishing the exercise.
Exercises.attempt-not-in-progress: Please start a new session to continue practicing.
Exercises.practice-exercises: Practice exercises to master the material

Utils.search-not-found: We couldn't find anything matching that.
Utils.search-description: Search thousands of free learning materials, educational articles, practice exercises, and study resources. Find exactly what you need to master any subject.

Home.title: What do you want to learn?

NotFound.description: Oops! That page doesn't exist or isn't ready yet.

Error.title: Oops, something went wrong!
Error.description: Please help us by reporting this on GitHub.

Contributor.title: Contributor
Contributor.description: Meet the people who made Nakafa possible.

ComingSoon.title: Coming Soon
ComingSoon.description: This feature is not available yet. Please check back later or contribute to the project.

Auth.profile-description: Explore user learning profiles featuring educational contributions, insightful comments, study progress tracking, and community engagement in collaborative learning.
Auth.chat-description: Connect with our AI learning assistant for personalized tutoring, homework help, concept explanations, and interactive educational conversations tailored to your needs.
Auth.subscriptions-description: Unlock the most powerful learning experience with Nakafa Pro.
Auth.name: Name
Auth.name-description: This name will appear on your profile and comments.
Auth.role-description: Your role helps us tailor your learning experience.
Auth.role-footer: You can change your role anytime.
Auth.api-key-description: Manage your API keys to authenticate with Nakafa API.
Auth.api-key-footer: Create a new API key here.
Auth.api-key-confirmation-description: Keep your API key safe and secure.
Auth.delete-api-key-description: Are you sure? This action cannot be undone.

Ai.error-message: Oops, something went wrong. Try switching the AI model.
Ai.rate-limit-message: Whoa, slow down! Please try again in a moment.
Ai.new-chat-title: What do you want to learn?
Ai.delete-chat-description: Are you sure? This chat cannot be recovered once deleted.
Ai.share-chat-description: Be careful when sharing this link with strangers.
Ai.private-description: Only you can view the chat.
Ai.private-chat-error-description: This isn't your chat. Ask the owner for access.
Ai.change-model-error: Oops, something went wrong! Please contact us.

Pricing.title: Pricing
Pricing.description: Explore Nakafa's pricing plans. Start free with unlimited access to K-12 and university materials. Upgrade to Pro for AI tutoring and advanced features.

Features.headline: <mark>Stuck on a lesson at 2am with no one to ask. We have been there.</mark> That is why we built this. Complete materials from elementary to university, practice problems with explanations, and AI ready to help whenever you need it. <mark>Free, no strings attached.</mark>
Features.materials-description: From basic concepts to advanced topics

AiSection.headline: Built for humans. <mark>Optimized for AI.</mark>
AiSection.description: Study on your phone at midnight. Learn with an AI tutor. Integrate content into your LMS. Every lesson on Nakafa is accessible instantly, in any format you need.
AiSection.feature-title: Your content, your format. Just add .md
AiSection.feature-description: Every page on Nakafa can be accessed as clean, structured markdown. Perfect for AI agents, developers, or anyone who wants content their way.
AiSection.students-description: Study with Nina. Access GPT, Claude, Gemini, and 15+ AI models. All in one place.
AiSection.developers-description: Build on our content. Access via llms.txt or integrate into your platform.
AiSection.schools-description: Integrate with your LMS. Connect Nakafa content to your classroom tools without friction.

About.meta-title: Fck Closed Education, Enjoy Free Open Education
About.title: Fck closed education, enjoy <mark>free open education</mark>
About.description: Our core mission is to provide high-quality, comprehensive educational content across a wide spectrum of subjects and topics.
About.community-title: Find people who get what you are learning
About.community-description: Every lesson is made by someone who was confused too. Join our Discord to ask questions, share resources, or help others out.
About.curriculum-title: Learn exactly <mark>what you need</mark>, <mark>when you need it</mark>
About.curriculum-description: Pick your grade, dive into any subject, or search for what you're stuck on. No endless scrolling.
About.events-description: Discover upcoming educational events, workshops, webinars, and community gatherings. Join us to learn, connect, and grow together.
About.trusted-headline: Trusted by <mark>thousands of students</mark> and <mark>teachers</mark> from leading schools and universities
About.trusted-description: Join the growing community of learners and educators who choose Nakafa for quality education.
